Summary: Implement passport issuance and lifecycle endpoint
Description: Add API surface to issue rotate expire and revoke AgentPassport.v1 with auditable lifecycle events.
Acceptance Criteria: Passport issuance endpoint validates schema and signer authority; revoke and expire states are enforced in privileged paid actions; audit trail is queryable.

Description: Resolve sponsorWalletRef policyRef and policyVersion from tenant environment profile risk tier and delegation depth.
Acceptance Criteria: Resolver returns deterministic mapping for identical inputs; resolver output is embedded into passport and settlement decision metadata; e2e tests cover dedicated and pooled wallet assignment.

Summary: Add funding policy and top-up automation
Description: Introduce threshold-based funding policy for managed and BYO rails with reserve rollback guarantees.
Acceptance Criteria: Wallet funding thresholds are configurable per policy; top-up flow emits deterministic events; failed reserve and top-up paths roll back cleanly without double-settlement.

Summary: Bind execution intent to authorization and settlement
Description: Require ExecutionIntent.v1 hash and request fingerprint to match authorize-payment and settlement verification paths.
Acceptance Criteria: Authorize-payment rejects intent mismatch with stable codes; settlement verification rechecks intent binding; mutation and replay attempts fail in deterministic tests.

Description: Ship Tier0 through Tier4 policy and profile packs with explicit spend risk delegation constraints and upgrade criteria.
Acceptance Criteria: Tier policy packs are versioned and simulatable via CLI; each tier maps to concrete allowlists and spend limits; migration guidance is documented.

Summary: Add no-bypass and authority boundary gate suite
Description: Create release-blocking negative tests for MCP stdio bridge HTTP and gateway paths plus signer and control authority boundary violations.
Acceptance Criteria: Bypass attempts fail deterministically in CI; unauthorized signer and control actions fail with stable codes; suite is mandatory in release workflow.

Summary: Add onboarding and autonomy readiness SLO gates
Description: Gate release on first-paid-call runtime SLO and policy decision latency and error SLO across host compatibility matrix.
Acceptance Criteria: SLO thresholds are codified and enforced in CI; regressions fail release gates; reports include per-host readiness and failure reasons.
